1:1 Tutoring

Learning tailored to each students capabilities. Topics are split into managable chunks to make learning more accessible for all abilities.

Interactive Learning

It's not just a video call. While talking we can type, share screens, and study digital resources.

Struggling Students

Specialist experience in taking challenged and struggling students to exam success.

What do I offer?

  • 11+ Prep

    Students learn how to interpret the questions and understand the comprehension tasks.

  • KS3

    We build a solid base of scientific knowledge for the future. Each student should feel confident and enjoy their learning.

  • GCSE

    We cover the full specification, fill any gaps in knowledge and prepare for the exams.

  • A-level

    We cover the full specification, study how the science topics are linked and prepare for exams.

  • Exam Paper Marking

    Students receive detailed feedback and model answers to each exam paper they completes they build their confidence for the real thing.

  • Revision

    Students learn different revision methods and complete a full set of resources for their exams.

Why get a tutor?

The support of a tutor helps students to thrive in their school environment.
